implementation_notes.download_instructions: Use Unsplash API or manual download from URLs above. Convert all to WebP format before deployment.
implementation_notes.attribution: Attribution not required for Unsplash Free licence, but recommended: 'Photo by [Photographer] on Unsplash'
implementation_notes.optimisation: Target file sizes: Hero <100KB, service cards <50KB, icons <20KB. Use Next.js Image component with width/height set.
implementation_notes.alt_text_seo: All suggested alt texts include Medway/Kent geo-keywords and service terms for image SEO.
implementation_notes.cursor_todo: Download images, convert to WebP using Squoosh or Sharp CLI, save to /public/images/, update src paths in components
